title: Coffeemaker: Modeling Riemann sums part - a

content.description: Hot water is dripping through a coffeemaker, filling a large cup with coffee. The amount of coffee in the cup at time t, 0 ≤ t ≤ 6, is given by a differentiable function C, where t is measured in minutes. Selected values of C(t), measured in ounces, are given in the table above.
content.question: Use the data in the table to approximate C'(3.5). Show the computations that lead to your answer, and indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Use the data in the table to approximate C'(3.5). Show the computations that lead to your answer, and indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
